subject: Re: Question
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Michelle,

Sounds like ghosts/spirits manipulating the radio to me.

Your experience with the "locking on" has also happened to me when I 
had a strong (angry), male ghost messing with the device during a 
home that was having a high level of activity (2 male earthbound 
apparitions).

The messages that I was able to record when it was happening 
were, "Stop that music," (it locked repeatedly on a a rock song, "I'm 
the man of the house" LOL Go figure!), and the message, "Please, son 
of a bitch, leave."  

Both audio recordings are in the LC's folder here.  :)

LC
http://www.angelsghosts.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "geekgurl66" <geekgurl66@...> wrote:
>
> Hello All, 
> Long time lurker here, got a question.
> I got the radio shack rs 469, did the hack and was having a tough 
time
> finding a speaker like the UFO geek uses for his box. I found a
> battery powered unit and now am experiencing the clicking sounds. 
Can
> anyone tell me where to find the small single speaker that was shown
> in the UFO Geeks hack? I think the batteries are causing the 
clicking.
> Oh also. I attempted to use the radio in a very active cemetary and
> the radio immediately locked on the am station 66. There was no 
sounds
> coming from it and each time I set it to search it would go back and
> lock. Did I have a hit from the other side and was too green to see 
that?
> Thanks for any and all input, would love to get this equipment going
> in the right direction as I keep getting signs of visitations and I
> feel as if I is my grandma trying to communicate with me.
> thanks,
> Michelle
>
